hymn.title: The flowing of the divine life
hymn.category: Various Aspects of the Inner Life—The Fellowship of Life

layout.singingstanza: The flow -- ing of life di -- vine, In spir -- it so sweet -- ly flows— The o -- ver -- flow -- ing life di -- vine, Nour -- ish -- ing my spir -- it so— Bring -- ing the Tri -- une God's full -- ness, In spir -- it op -- er -- ates and moves, Bring -- ing me all of His sup -- ply— Life as my sup -- ply.

lyrics.stanza: Oh, this precious life divine Is the Triune God Himself! All He is and all He has Are all concealed in this life. God's life into my spirit comes, Mingling with me in life as one— Wisdom, pow'r, holy righteousness Are my experience.
